meanings.definition: A formal statement testifying to someone's character or qualifications.
meanings.sent1: The company displayed numerous testimonials from satisfied customers on their website.
meanings.sent2: I always read testimonials before choosing a new product to buy.
meanings.sent3: The testimonials at the job interview were so positive, they made the applicant blush.
meanings.sent4: Her actions were like testimonials to her true nature.
meanings.sent5: The testimonials about the restaurant's delicious food made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A statement or advertisement endorsing a product or service.
meanings.sent1: The TV commercial featured glowing testimonials from happy customers.
meanings.sent2: Before purchasing the software, I checked out the testimonials on their website.
meanings.sent3: The testimonials for the new shampoo were so convincing, I had to try it.
meanings.sent4: The success of the product was a living testimonial to its quality.
meanings.sent5: The testimonials for the fitness program inspired me to sign up immediately.
